CONNECTOR¶

Wrapper for request module

class pet_store.rest_request.connector.Connector[source]¶

Implements static methods for wep-api requests

static delete(url, headers)[source]¶

Wrapper for post request

Parameters:
  • url – URL for request
  • headers – headers for request
Returns:

answer from server
static get(url, headers)[source]¶

Wrapper for get request

Parameters:
  • url – URL for request
  • headers – headers for request
Returns:

answer from server
static post(url, data_xml, headers)[source]¶

Wrapper for post request

Parameters:
  • url – URL for request
  • data_xml – data for request
  • headers – headers for request
Returns:

answer from server
